00025 class LaplacianKernel

00027  public:
00031   LaplacianKernel() : bandwidth(1.0)
00032   { }

00040       bandwidth(bandwidth)

00042 
00054   template<typename VecType>
00055   double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b) const
00056   {
00057     // The precalculation of gamma saves us a little computation time.
00058     return exp(-metric::EuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b) / bandwidth);
00059   }
00060 
00068   double Evaluate(double t) const
00069   {
00070     // The precalculation of gamma saves us a little computation time.
00071     return exp(-t / bandwidth);
00072   }
00073 
00075   double Bandwidth() const { return bandwidth; }
00077   double& Bandwidth() { return bandwidth; }
